Column1: Stoinis to Shami, out Caught by Maxwell!! Australia 1-0 up in the series. Nothing to lose for Shami and he thwacked it flat-footed from the crease, Maxwell had all the time in the world to sit underneath and gobble the simplest of catches at mid-wicket. Shami c Maxwell b Stoinis 1(2)

Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, dropped by Handscomb! Bhuvi gets a thick top-edge on the pull and the fielder at deep backward square did an excellent job running across to his right and dive full length to nestle the ball . As Handscomb dived, the elbows hit the ground and the ball popped out of his hands
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, no run, jumps down the pitch and toe-ends the drive straight to cover
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR, makes room and pumps the full delivery in the gap through extra cover. Bhuvi is having fun out there
Stoinis to Shami, 1 run, off-cutter on the pads, Shami glances to short fine
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, slower ball outside off, Bhuvi chips the drive over cover, just evades the backtracking fielder at point

Siddle to Kuldeep Yadav, out Caught by Khawaja!! Khawaja doesn't drop it this time. Kuldeep went a long way across and had a big swipe at the slower ball outside off stump, dragged off the thick inside half and picked out the man at deep backward square. Kuldeep Yadav c Khawaja b Siddle 3(6)
Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, yorker length on the pads, Bhuvi sends the flick into the mid-wicket and is content with a single
Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, 2 runs, makes room, waits for the slower delivery and spanks it over cover for a couple of runs
Siddle to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, short and slow on leg-stump, Kuldeep drags the pull from outside off to deep square
Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, advances down the pitch and pushes the full delivery into the covers
Siddle to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR, short and wide, thanks for coming! Bhuvi moves legside and flays this nice and clean over backward point

Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, Khawaja drops a dolly. Swung high and mighty into the night sky, Khawaja stationed himself nice and steady at long-on and maybe he was distracted with too much air time and ended up shelling it. Straight in and straight out
Stoinis to Kuldeep Yadav, leg byes, 1 run, walks across and misses the flick, pings the thigh pad and rolls into the leg-side
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, slower short ball on the stumps, Bhuvi gets the pull to the left of short fine, Behrendorff gets a hand but was always a tough chance that
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, no run, walks a long way across and looks for the scoop, beaten for pace
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR, jumps down the track and clobbers the length ball through covers, timed it well and managed to beat Marsh's dive at sweeper cover
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR, jumps out of his crease and slogs a short of length delivery from outside off, sends a thick edge flying over backward point to his left
J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, rings in another yorker and Bhuvi can only squeeze it as far as square leg
J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run, yorker on the stumps, Bhuvi inside-edges the flick onto his pads
J Richardson to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, fetches the slower short ball and pulls along the ground to deep mid-wicket

J Richardson to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, off-cutter, drifting into the pads, Kuldeep picks it very late and by the time he thought of putting bat to ball but the ball was behind him post the deflection off the pads
J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, early into the slog, slow and wide of off, Bhuvi chips it off the toe-end towards long-on
J Richardson to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, full on leg-stump, flicked away to deep square
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, no run, change of pace outside off, Bhuvneshwar looks to send a slog over short fine but makes no contact
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 2 runs, gets across his off-stump and slogs, drops inches short of Khawaja at long-on. He might hurt his hammy in the process, walks gingerly and shows some sign of discomfort

Stoinis to Rohit, out Caught by Maxwell!! Should be the game for Australia you'd think. Rohit Sharma had no other option but to give it all and boy did he play a gem! He walks off to a standing ovation at the SCG. Saw the short ball and went for his go-to shot, the pull. Big top-edge and Maxi does well to run forward and claim a clean catch at deep mid-wicket. Rohit c Maxwell b Stoinis 133(129) [4s-10 6s-6]
Stoinis to Rohit, FOUR, full toss wide of Rohit's off-stump, he slaps it off the cue end and managed to get it over the backtracking fielder at mid-off. No-one in the deep
Stoinis to Rohit, wide, slower and fuller, well outside the tramline and Stoinis has to reload that
Stoinis to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run, shuffles across, reads the slower ball and pulls off the bottom half over mid-on
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, full toss outside off, Rohit drags the pull off the toe-end to wide long-on
J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run, another slower ball, but this one's got a bit of extra bounce and Bhuvi can't lay bat on ball yet again
J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run, Bhuvi getting his own treatment, slower ball outside off stump. A swing and a miss

J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run, direct hit and Rohit would have been on his bike. Slammed straight to Finch at short cover and Rohit was backing up too far, had to turn around and put in a desperate dive, even that wouldn't have saved him in fact. Fortunately for Rohit, Finch missed the target
J Richardson to Bhuvneshwar, no run, yorker, nails it in the middle of middle, Bhuvi digs it into the pitch
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, short ball outside off, Rohit Sharma on his tippy toes steers the ball wide of point

J Richardson to Jadeja, out Caught by Shaun Marsh!! Jhye Richardson at it again. Once again, it's the Perth Scorchers combination. Bowled it short and far from Jadeja's reach, the batsman had no other option but to go for his shots, looked to flay it square but gets a thick top-edge that lands in the bucket hands of Shaun Marsh at deep backward point.Jadeja c Shaun Marsh b J Richardson 8(13)
Stoinis to Rohit, FOUR, gets another gift from Stoinis. Length ball outside off and Rohit bullies it over mid-wicket, couple of bounces and into the fence

Stoinis to Rohit, SIX, why lose your shape when you can hit shots like that? Full and in the zone, what does Rohit Sharma do? Clears his front leg and deposits Stoinis flat into the stands over mid-wicket
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, slower ball outside off, a swing and a miss for Rohit

Stoinis to Jadeja, 1 run, jumps across and in line with the delivery, drops it off the thigh into the leg-side and calls Rohit for a quick single. Stoinis rushes forward and underarms a throw at the batting end, had that hit Rohit might have been in trouble
Stoinis to Jadeja, no run, shuffles to leg-side early and gets a bumper around the shoulder, pulls and misses
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, one hand comes off as he attempts to lift this slower delivery over long-on. Horribly mistimed but to Rohit's delight, it falls way short of the incoming long-on fielder
Lyon to Jadeja, no run, no room on offer, Jadeja tries to get it in the gap on the off-side but under-edges it past the off stump
Lyon to Jadeja, no run, cuts and cuts straight to backward point
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, heaves and skews a thick under edge behind square leg
Lyon to Rohit, SIX. What power! Lines up for a nice toss up and marmalizes it into the crowd over long-on with absolute disdain
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run, makes room and cuts the flatter delivery square on the off-side
Lyon to Jadeja, no run, sliding in towards leg stump, Jadeja inside-edges the flick onto pad
Maxwell to Rohit, FOUR, high full toss outside off, Rohit lost his shape trying to slog but a thick toe-edge flew through to the third man fence in a giffy
Maxwell to Rohit, no run, looks to cut/dab to third man and the pace on the delivery zings past his outside edge

Maxwell to Rohit, 2 runs, up in the air for a long, long time. Drops in no-man's land. Ugly heave from Rohit and he got a thick top-edge on that, the fielders on the leg-side were pretty deep and by the time deep mid-wicket rushed in he realized he was never going to get there
Maxwell to Rohit, no run, yorker fired at the base of off, Rohit couldn't help but squeeze it out
Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run, flicks again into the same gap and the fielder's sharp this time, only a single
Maxwell to Jadeja, 2 runs, full on middle, Jadeja gets the flick wide of mid-wicket and they pinch an easy two
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run, pushed to point and they take a single
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, absolutely biffs this past the non-striker, Jadeja was in danger for a fleeting moment but thankfully for him it went wide and straight down to long-off

Lyon to Rohit, no run, huge lbw shout but reckon it was drifting down leg. Rohit missed the sweep and was pinned around the knee roll on the front leg. Oh chop all that, it pitched outside leg. End of story
Lyon to Rohit, no run, opens the bat face and drives straight to backward point
Lyon to Jadeja, 1 run, makes room, stays leg-side of the offbreak and punches it sweetly through covers
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, tossed up on middle, Rohit works it wide of long-on
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run. Driven. Keeps the strike with a single to long-on

J Richardson to Rohit, 2 runs, Rohit Sharma tons up! His 22nd in ODIs and one of his best considering the start India got early on. Flicks it off the pads, completes two and barely celebrates; just a warm hug to his partner a mild rise of the bat to acknowledge the applause and back to marking his crease. Class!
J Richardson to Jadeja, 1 run, takes on the short ball and rolls his wrists on the pull to deep mid-wicket
J Richardson to Jadeja, no run, short of length outside off, Jadeja lets it be

J Richardson to Karthik, out Bowled!! The Perth Scorchers boys are rocking at the SCG. It's Jhye Richardson's turn this time. Managed to get the landing right[Front foot]...inches. Matter of inches really. Second read DK's instincts and pulled his length back while offering little room for the batsman, DK was on the hustle and he went through the shot a bit too early. Ekes a thick inside edge and that makes an absolute mess of the stumps behind. Karthik b J Richardson 12(21)
J Richardson to Karthik, no run, fullish and angling into middle, punch-driven....right off the middle but straight to mid-off
Siddle to Rohit, no run, yorker just outside off, Rohit digs it out into the off-side

Siddle to Rohit, FOUR, this is Rohit Sharma at his very best! Shuffles a fraction, gets down on one knee and paddles this away over short fine. Kept his eyes still till he made contact and the timing on the shot took care of the rest
Siddle to Rohit, FOUR, can't be bowling short to Rohit! He yet again stands tall and clobbers it in the gap over mid-wicket
Siddle to Rohit, no run, drills the full delivery to the right of mid-off, a diving save from the fielder there

Siddle to Rohit, FOUR, the mishits don't matter when you put it in the gaps. Hasn't been at his fluent best, but he's taking his chances wisely. Sees length and smacks the pull over mid-wicket, no-one in the deep and although it flew off the splice, the power on the strole carried it all the way
Siddle to Karthik, 1 run, slogs across the line and manages ample contact to power the ball to deep square
J Richardson to Karthik, 1 run, sees width and smartly dabs it backwards of point for a strike-retaining single
J Richardson to Karthik, no run, angling in from a length, textbook stuff from DK. Classic forward defence; high elbow, still head, soft hands and all that...
J Richardson to Karthik, no run, fullish and zooming in on the stumps, DK's early on the flick and he sends a leading edge dribbling back to the bowler
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, lets the ball come to him, deadbats this into the off-side and races across for a quick single
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, composes himself and dinks the ball into the leg-side
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, big swish across the line from Rohit! Had he connected it....well, well! Wasn't far from the edge and wasn't far from the off-stump either
Behrendorff to Karthik, 2 runs, hint of glove on that? Yep. Length ball slipping down leg, DK attempts a pull and manages some contact on that before dragging it to the right of fine leg
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, opens the face and glides a single into the point region
Behrendorff to Rohit, 2 runs, just a mere push! Puts a straight bat to Behrendorff's pacy length delivery and it hurries across the turf straight of long-off
Behrendorff to Rohit, 2 runs, could have easily chopped this on! Went fetching for the wide-ish length delivery and the thick inside edge flew past leg peg en route to fine leg
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run, hacks the length ball off the pads and it goes on the bounce to the man at deep square
Behrendorff to Karthik, no run, chips down the track and tries to drive straight, a slight bit of nip off the seam meant it shaved the inside edge and dribbled back towards the keeper
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, gives himself a bit of room outside off, but doesn't get any width from Stoinis. Instead this was bowled into his body and Rohit can only knock it as far as mid-wicket
Stoinis to Karthik, 1 run, gets across and flicks off the cue end to deep square
Stoinis to Karthik, no run, walks towards the line of the delivery and drives this straight to mid-off
Stoinis to Karthik, no run, looks to pinch a quick single with a deft touch under his eyes, but the ball rushed to backward point much quicker than he anticipated
Stoinis to Karthik, no run, jumps out of the crease and flicks the full delivery off the pads, hits it straight to the man at short mid-wicket
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, short of length outside off, Rohit punches it on the up and slots it wide of the man at cover
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, drops this with soft hands into the leg-side and keeps strike with a quick single
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run, shimmies down, gets inside the line of the length delivery and helps it with the angle down to fine leg
Behrendorff to Karthik, no run, opens the bat face and punches crisply to Maxi at backward point
Behrendorff to Karthik, no run, short of length on middle and leg, DK hops back and blocks it into the leg-side
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, sweetly punched past the non-striker for a quick single
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, 133ks fullish and closing in on middle, Rohit's drive goes straight to cover
Stoinis to Karthik, 2 runs, gets it finer this time, was too close to cut or steer, but DK set himself nice and steady to send it fine of third man and sneak a couple of valuable runs for India
Stoinis to Karthik, no run, waits inside the crease, opens the bat face at the last minute but can't hit the gap on the dab on the off-side
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, shuffles across, pats the ball on its head and gets it rolling past square leg for a single
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, slashes at a wide delivery and gets beaten for lack of pace
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, full and attacking the stumps, driven straight to mid-on
Stoinis to Karthik, 1 run, leans on the front foot and drives on the up, gets it square of sweeper cover
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run, high hands, pokes the ball into the cover region and takes off
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, full at the stumps, Rohit whips the drive wide of long-on
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, good length on off, Rohit taps it to cover
Behrendorff to Karthik, 1 run, width outside off and DK uses all of it to guide a single to third man

Behrendorff to Dhoni, out Lbw!! Dhoni's pinned leg before and India don't have any reviews any left. Did that pitch outside leg? Oh my! It certainly looked like it pitched well outside the leg peg. Huge blow for the visitors. It was full and at the stumps and Dhoni missed the flick. The only debate could have been regarding the pitch of the delivery and the umpire Michael Gough didn't have too much to think there. Dhoni lbw b Behrendorff 51(96) [4s-3 6s-1]
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, punched on the up to the left of extra cover

Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, tilts the bat face slightly and slots the drive backwards of point. The inital call was for two, but Rohit was quick to spot the danger in squeezing a second, puts his hand up and says no straightaway
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, drops the ball with soft hands into the off-side and calls MS for a quick single. Sent back and Rohit had to rush to make his ground
Stoinis to Rohit, no run, cuts and cuts late, can't get it past backward point
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, short of length outside off, Dhoni stabs it past cover
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, gets across and taps the ball into the off-side

Stoinis to Dhoni, FOUR, fifty for MSD! Absolute madness in Sydney and the fans have every reason to be delighted. His 68th in ODIs, gets there with a blazing on-drive past the diving left hand of mid-on. No grand celebrations from MS, just a wave of the willow and back to business
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, sits deep inside the crease and drops this 130ks delivery near his feet and hustles for a quick single
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, feet's cemented inside the crease and he attempts to clobber one through the off-side. No timing and straight to cover
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, hurries out of his crease and looks to force it through covers, Behrendorff's extra pace and zip on the wicket zing past the outside edge
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, 132ks back of a length just outside off, Dhoni punches to cover
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, jabs at this length delivery and he picks the man at square leg this time
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, fuller and wider of off, Dhoni's drive has been intercepted by the man at cover
Lyon to Rohit, no run, attacks the stumps with a flatter delivery, Rohit helps it to short fine

Lyon to Rohit, SIX, Rohit Sharma smashes Nathan Lyon into the Australian change room. What swagger! Advanced down for a biggie and the ball couldn't help but oblige Rohit's bat swing. Got underneath and pumped it many-a-mile over mid-wicket. Perhaps the biggest of the night?
Lyon to Rohit, no run, angles it across and makes Rohit fetch outside off, no feet on the cut and it drops just short of the man at backward point
Lyon to Rohit, no run, skiddy length delivery on middle, Rohit jabs it into the leg-side
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, uses his feet, works the ball into the mid-wicket pocket and ticks another single
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs, flicked away off the pads to deep square

Behrendorff to Rohit, FOUR, that's Rohit Sharma at his very best! He's picking the gaps to perfection. Knows there's no-one at long-off and he just lifted this fullish delivery with minimal power, once it went over mid-off it's only heading one way....
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, looks to cut this late but can't get it past backward point

Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, turns this to mid-wicket and calls for a quick single. Dhoni was made to hustle-bustle a bit towards the end as Khawaja was quick to pounce and fire a throw at the bowling end
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, back of a length wide of off, Rohit stays beside the line and steers it down to third man

Behrendorff to Rohit, FOUR, smart cricket from Rohit Sharma! He read the field perfectly and went for the scoop, the fine leg was inside the ring and although he couldn't get the desired timing, he managed to power that over the fielder and in fairness, that's all was needed
Behrendorff to Dhoni, leg byes, 1 run, angled into the hips, Dhoni sits back and tucks with soft hands into the on-side
Behrendorff to Dhoni, wide, pitches outside leg and slips down further this short of length delivery, Dhoni was down the track in a flash and he fails to connect with the whippy pull
Lyon to Rohit, no run, tossed up on middle and leg, Rohit clips into the leg-side and thinks of a quick single. Dhoni says no
Lyon to Rohit, no run, punched back to the bowler
Lyon to Rohit, 2 runs, fiddles at a wide delivery and skews an outside edge fine of third man

Lyon to Dhoni, leg byes, 1 run, huge appeal for leg before from Lyon. Dhoni was down the pitch and was defeated by this skiddy offbreak on middle, there wasn't a great deal of spin but it hit him in line with middle, too far down the pitch perhaps? And that prompted the umpire to rule it in the favour of the batsman
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, shimmies down, realizes he's too close to the pitch of the delivery and adjusts well to manoeuvre the ball to square leg
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, flat and sliding onto leg stump, Rohit nudges gently into the leg-side for an easy single
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, opens the bat-face and steers this length ball down to third man
J Richardson to Dhoni, leg byes, 1 run, skiddy short of length delivery on the pads and Dhoni is late on his tuck/glance. Off the pad and the ball rolls towards long leg
J Richardson to Dhoni, wide, bumper down the leg-side, ignored

J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, 141.7kph, in-slanter from a good length and Dhoni is rapped on the front pad. He was late to bring his bat down and the ball thuds into the batter's pad. Was sliding down leg and hence no major appeal from the Australians
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, fuller in length, bowled at 140kph, Rohit pushes it towards cover and the batters scamper through for a quick single
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, the partnership between Dhoni and Rohit is now 100. Back of a length delivery, punched in front of square on the off-side
J Richardson to Dhoni, 2 runs, Dhoni walks out of his crease and forces this short of length delivery to deep point
Lyon to Rohit, no run, stump-to-stump line, defended back to Lyon
Lyon to Rohit, no run, more flight on this occasion, pushed back to the bowler
Lyon to Rohit, no run, defends this flat ball down the pitch

Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, Dhoni puts in a dive to make his ground. The right-hander went back in the crease and patted it towards the off-side. Marsh ran in from cover and fired an underarm throw. Misses the target, Dhoni was home, anyway. Sprinted across and put in a full length dive
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, quick in-turner, Rohit is late to bring his bat down, gets an inside edge to backward square leg
Lyon to Rohit, no run, short of length from round the wicket, flat in trajectory, Rohit taps it into the off-side, Lyon mops up

J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, a loose shot from Dhoni. Wasn't that short and he was trying to heave it away through the leg-side. The skiddy ball scoots under the swinging blade and bounced over the sticks
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, just a hint of width outside off and that's sufficient for Rohit to run it down to third man
J Richardson to Dhoni, leg byes, 1 run, 134.9kph full ball on the pads, Dhoni misses the flick and the ball rolls into the leg-side off his pad
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, late-dabbed wide of backward point for an easy single
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, closes the bat-face and nurdles this skiddy ball towards square leg
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, 131kph, short of length delivery with a bit of extra bounce, nudged into the leg-side
Maxwell to Rohit, no run, tossed up delivery, full on off, Rohit drives it to cover

Maxwell to Rohit, FOUR, fifty for Rohit! His 38th in ODIs. The batsmen don't want Maxi to settle here. Sees the width on offer outside off on this away-drifter and threw his bat hard at it. Didn't quite control of it as it went in the air off the outer half. But fortunately for Rohit, it went through the gap between backward point and short third man. Rases his bat and soaks in the applause!
Maxwell to Dhoni, 1 run, Dhoni skips down the track and clips off the inseide edge. The ball rolls to fine leg

Maxwell to Dhoni, FOUR, Dhoni unleashes a fierce sweep shot. A big stride outside off, got down on a knee and broomed it powerfully perpendicular to the pitch. Jhye Richardson at square leg dived full length to his left, missed it by an inch or two
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, quicker ball - 90.6kph - Dhoni gets forward to blunt it to mid-wicket
Maxwell to Dhoni, no run, flat ball from a short of length, Dhoni hangs back to pat it to point
Siddle to Rohit, no run, good length delivery on off at 136.3kph, Rohit covers the line and solidly blocks it towards cover
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, 137kph, the line is too straight and Dhoni nurdles it towards square leg for a single
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, camps back in the crease and hops to punch this back of a length delivery, hits it straight to cover
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, off-pace ball - 122kph, Rohit spots it and is happy to knock it towards long-on

Siddle to Rohit, FOUR, fuller than a good length ball, was angled in and Rohit drove it on the rise. Didn't quite get it off the middle as he went hard on it, but the placement was spot on. Through extra cover and there's no one stopping that
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, 136.3kph, fullish ball on middle and leg, a shuffling Dhoni turns it through square leg
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, pitched up delivery at 129.7kph, Dhoni pushes it wide of cover with a crouched stance
Stoinis to Dhoni, wide, Stoinis bangs it in short and errs in line - down the leg-side. Dhoni ignores it
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, full and slanted in, Rohit clips off the inner half towards backward square leg. The batsmen don't risk the second run
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, clips this length ball through mid-wicket
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, short of a good length ball wide of off, left alone
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, shortish ball, Dhoni mistimes the swivel-pull to mid-wicket

Stoinis to Dhoni, 2 runs, almost a wicket! The short mid-wicket fielder got fingertips to it. Stoinis saw the batter come down the track and shortened his length. Despite not getting into a great position, Dhoni went through with his pull shot. Mistimed and a leaping Siddle could only get a finger or two on it
Siddle to Rohit, no run, full on off, Rohit pushes it to mid-off
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, width offered and Dhoni moves across to punch it to sweeper cover
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, 137.8kph, fuller ball around off, Dhoni gets forward and drives to cover on the walk
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, a confident press across to tap this good length ball to cover
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, in-angler from a short of length, Dhoni is happy to let it go on line

Siddle to Dhoni, FOUR, first four of the innings! Quick hands from Dhoni. Sees the width outside off and uses his wrists to scythe it through point. The deep cover fielder can only see it go past the ropes
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, full and wide of off, another firm drive off the front foot from Dhoni. Lyon dives to his right at short cover and parries it towards mid-off
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, very full ball at 134.3kph, with a bent knee Dhoni drives hard, hit straight to the man at cover
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, rib-tickler, Rohit helps it on its way with a tuck towards long leg
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, 129.5kph, fuller than a good length ball outside off, a whippy cover drive for a single. Got it off the middle, but there's protection in the deep
Stoinis to Dhoni, 2 runs, in-angling short of a good length ball, Dhoni glances it off the inner edge to backward square leg. They come back for the second. Good running
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, an uppish drive towards mid-off for a quick single
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, quicker ball - bowled at 102.1kph, Dhoni hangs back to a ball that he should have been played off the front foot. Flays his bat at it and finds the man at cover
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, tad fuller, 91.3kph, Rohit eases the drive down to long-on
Lyon to Rohit, no run, 91.9kph, flat and marginally outside off, Rohit defends it on the off-side
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, another shimmy down the pitch from MS, whips with the turn, but mishits it. A single to deep mid-wicket

Lyon to Dhoni, no run, Dhoni comes down the track and is nowhere close to the pitch. He was looking to defensively push it into the leg-side and gets hit on the front leg. The impact was well outside off, hence no appeal
Lyon to Rohit, 3 runs, flat in-turner from a short of length, Rohit waits for the ball to come and late-dabs it fine of the fielder at short third man
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, 131.7kph, pitched up delivery, Dhoni stays in his crease and drives it straight to the man positioned at mid-off
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, punched through covers for a single
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, shortish ball down leg, Dhoni swivel-pulls it to fine leg
Stoinis to Rohit, 1 run, closes the bat-face to work this length ball through square leg
Stoinis to Dhoni, 1 run, the line is straight and Dhoni tucks it around the corner - deep backward square leg
Stoinis to Dhoni, no run, back of a length delivery at 126.6kph, bounces more than Dhoni anticipated. Past the inside edge on his tuck and MS gets hit around the tummy

Lyon to Rohit, SIX, that hit spoils the over for Lyon. India's innings so far - 4 sixes, 0 fours. Excellent use of the feet from the Indian vice captain. Dances down the track, gets close the pitch of the ball and flogs it hard over deep mid-wicket
Lyon to Rohit, no run, Rohit is watchful. hint of away drift and Rohit keeps it out on the off-side
Lyon to Rohit, no run, tossed up wide of off, Rohit presses forward and stonewalls
Lyon to Rohit, no run, 89.4kph, non-spinner down the leg-side, past Rohit's attempted sweep. Might have brushed the batter's pad
Lyon to Rohit, no run, back-footed pat towards cover against a flat ball
Lyon to Rohit, no run, 93kph, Rohit leans forward and blocks
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, on a good length and just wide of off, Dhoni lifts his bat and lets it go
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, on a fuller length and outside off, Rohit opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, slower one outside off, Dhoni steers it down to third man for a single
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, on a length and outside off, Dhoni gets behind this delivery and pushes it to cover
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, very full and attacking the stumps, Dhoni drives it back to the bowler
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, uses the room and runs it down to third man for a single
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, comes across and pushes it to the leg-side

Lyon to Dhoni, SIX, that's the MS, India knows. That's the MS, the cricket fraternity knows. He dashes down the ground, reaches close to the ball and gives an all mighty MSD heave. And when he hits it, it stays hit. A long way back into the stands. MSD needed this hit, India needed this hit!
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, works it to the leg-side for a single
Lyon to Rohit, 2 runs, in the air, well above the in-field. Rohit dashes down the ground and he wanted to clear long-off, ends up mistiming it and drags it a lot squarer than he would have liked
Lyon to Rohit, no run, this one keeps a shade low, Rohit adjusts well and whips it to square leg
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, on a fuller length and outside off, Dhoni opens the face of the bat to guide it to the off-side
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, fuller length delivery on the stumps, Rohit tucks it to deep mid-wicket

Siddle to Rohit, SIX, that will ease the nerves in the dressing room. You cannot bowl short to Rohit, you just can't. He picks up the length in a canter, gets on top of the ball and powers the pull shot into the stands for a maximum

Siddle to Rohit, 2 runs, you could sense the pressure was building and Rohit charges down the ground on this ball. He wanted to heave it to the on-side, it comes off the outside half of the blade and it just about clears backward point
Siddle to Rohit, no run, yorker length delivery on the stumps, Rohit steers it to the off-side
Siddle to Rohit, no run, back of a length delivery wide of off, Rohit attempts a heave over backward point, ends up making no contact

Lyon to Dhoni, no run, walks down the ground and defends it back to Lyon. He plays out a maiden against Lyon! Dhoni surely needs to change his approach. He and India are going nowhere with their innings
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, touch short and outside off, Dhoni goes on the back foot and mistimes the cut to cover
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, offie on the stumps, Dhoni comes forward and defends it back
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, another defensive shot back to the bowler
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, first show of intent from Dhoni, he charges forward and crunches the drive, finds Lyon
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, plunges forward and defends it to Lyon
Siddle to Rohit, no run, fuller length delivery on the stumps, blocked back
Siddle to Rohit, no run, strikes him on the pads. And a huge appeal from Siddle again. It was sliding down leg and umpire wasn't getting carried away with the zeal of Siddle
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run, this one was on the stumps and Dhoni flicks it wide of mid-on
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, comes forward and drives it to cover. Dhoni is 5 off 28 balls! I wonder for how long he will keep batting in this fashion
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, on a good length and attacking the stumps, Dhoni pushes it back
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, on a length and around off, Dhoni gets behind this delivery and pushes it to cover
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, fuller length delivery outside off, Dhoni punches it to sweeper cover
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, flatter one on the stumps, Rohit knocks it down to long-on
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run, goes on the back foot and steers it to the off-side for a single
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, goes for a sweep and slips, he almost falls over. It ends up at short fine
Lyon to Dhoni, no run, plunges forward and defends it back to the bowler
Lyon to Rohit, 1 run, goes on the back foot and knocks it down the ground
Siddle to Dhoni, no run, on a good length and on the stumps, Dhoni blocks it back

Siddle to Dhoni, no run, Dhoni walks into the shot and Siddle delivers it wide of off, he goes for the drive away from the body but he ends up playing inside the line of the ball and it fizzes past his outside edge
Siddle to Rohit, 1 run, uses the width to good effect and steers it down to third man for a single
Siddle to Rohit, no run, another fuller length delivery and around off, inside edges it back on the pads and it ends up on the off-side
Siddle to Rohit, no run, fuller length delivery on the stumps, Rohit flicks it straight to mid-wicket

Siddle to Dhoni, leg byes, 1 run, rapped MSD on the pads and he goes up in appeal like a kid. That's his first delivery in ODI cricket after almost a decade so one can understand the excitement. There was a clear inside edge and umpire was unmoved. It deflects to the off-side and Dhoni will take a single

Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, just a hint of room on this back of a length delivery, Rohit wanted to run it down to third man but ends up finding backward point. He wanted a run but MSD sends him back
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, fuller length delivery and attacking the stumps again, Rohit plunges forward and blocks it back to Behrendorff
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, on a fuller length and on the stumps, Rohit gets behind this delivery and defends it back to the bowler
Behrendorff to Dhoni, 1 run, good length delivery on the stumps, Dhoni tucks it wide of backward square leg and takes a single
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, very full and attacking the stumps, Dhoni charges forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Behrendorff to Rohit, 1 run, fuller length delivery angling across the right-hander, Rohit runs it down to third man
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, rising short ball outside off and Rohit slices it down to third man off an outside edge
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, hooks the short ball down to fine leg, easy single. Need more of these, do India
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, keeps a touch low outside off, Dhoni looks to punch that off his back foot but the ball skids on and hits the cue-end on its way to the keeper
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, tad short, Dhoni rides the bounce and knocks the ball in front of mid-off. 'Nope' is the call as it goes straight to the fielder
J Richardson to Rohit, 1 run, incoming length delivery and Rohit nudges it to wide of mid-on and ambles across to the other end
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, 134.9kph, back of a length and Rohit guides it back to the bowler
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, back of a length outside off and it's been punched in front of cover by Dhoni
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, looks to tuck the length ball across the line but ends up getting hit on his thigh pad
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, on his front foot to cream his on-drive but straight to the fielder inside the circle
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, touch full around off and it's been driven down the pitch by Dhoni. Behrendorff gets his hands to it and parries it to mid-on
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, in the channel outside off, a length delivery that clips Dhoni's pads as he leaves it alone. A mild appeal by the bowler for an lbw as he didn't offer a shot
Behrendorff to Dhoni, no run, on a length around off and it's been eased in front of mid-off by Dhoni. Rohit is eager for a single, but Dhoni isn't
J Richardson to Dhoni, 1 run, flicks the length delivery off an inside edge towards square leg. 10000th run by Dhoni for India in ODIs.

J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, that could have been wicket number 4 down! Short of a length around off and Dhoni goes for a pull. Gets an inside edge on to his thigh pad as the ball lobs in front of square leg. Shadow practices his hook soon after
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, spears in a length delivery around off and it's been pushed in front of extra-cover
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, jagging away from the batsman outside off, Dhoni shoulders
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, in the channel around off, Dhoni defends it towards extra-cover
J Richardson to Dhoni, wide, another short ball and wide outside off, left alone
J Richardson to Dhoni, wide, down the leg side, and Richardson concedes his first run in the form of an extra
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, seaming away from the batsman a touch, Dhoni feels for it and gets beaten on his outside edge. Danger
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, attempts a back foot punch against a shortish delivery and gets it off the cue-end towards cover

Behrendorff to Rohit, SIX, Rohit Sharma is off the mark with a six! That's more like him. A length delivery on the pads and the Hitman flicks it towards deep square leg where Marsh takes a catch but at the same time he's in contact with the boundary cushions. Fans in the Indian contingent are delighted as they're waving their flags for the Men in Blue
Behrendorff to Rohit, no ball, Rohit finally gets a chance to get off the mark. Why? Next ball would be a free hit, the reason being. Was a length delivery around off and Rohit dabs it to cover-point
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, around off and it's a delivery swinging away, drilled to the fielder at mid-off by Rohit
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, overpitched delivery outside off and it's driven to cover by Rohit
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, drives the fullish delivery around middle and leg, driven to mid-on
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, short and wide outside off, Rohit flays at it only to get beaten
J Richardson to Dhoni, no run, back of a length around off, Dhoni punches it towards mid-on

J Richardson to Rayudu, out Lbw!! Richardson is on fire, Australia are, in fact. They've got three wickets already. A good length delivery around middle and leg, snakes in to a touch and beats the batsman's flick. Rapped on the pads and this was going on to hit the leg-stump. India in trouble and are in desperate need of a partnership. Rayudu lbw b J Richardson 0(2)
J Richardson to Rayudu, no run, back of a length around off, Rayudu dabs it towards the off side

J Richardson to Kohli, out Caught by Stoinis!! That's gone! Indian skipper is back to the hut, without much to his name. Picks out the fielder at short square leg to perfection. Was on the pads and Kohli flicks it straight to Stoinis. Excellent field placement has brought about VK's downfall. Australians would be riding high on confidence after that. Kohli c Stoinis b J Richardson 3(8)
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, back of a length around middle and leg, cramping up the batsman who works it towards square leg
J Richardson to Kohli, no run, in the channel outside off, on a length and Kohli dabs it to backward point

Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, back of a length outside off and Rohit blocks it in front of cover. He's faced 12 deliveries and is yet to get off the mark. #JustRohitThings. He can make up for it later. We know that, don't we?
Behrendorff to Kohli, 1 run, overpitched delivery outside off, Kohli slices it down to third man off an inside edge
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run, holds back the length on this one and Kohli plays it with soft hands to point
Behrendorff to Kohli, 2 runs, Kohli's off the mark! Touch full and wide outside off, Kohli leans forward and carves it past the diving fielder at cover-point for two runs
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run, touch full around middle and leg, Kohli drives it to the fielder at mid-on
Behrendorff to Kohli, no run, in the channel outside off and the Indian skipper leaves it be
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, Richardson starts off with a maiden over! A length delivery that shapes away to an extent and the batsman lets it through to the keeper. Top stuff by the quickie
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, short and wide outside off, Rohit flays at it with hard hands but gets beaten due to the swing
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, back to the off-stump line, on a good length and Rohit lets it through to the keeper
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, back of a length around middle and leg, nudged into the leg side
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, outside off and a linear delivery, Rohit shoulders arms
J Richardson to Rohit, no run, in the channel outside off, Rohit slaps it to the fielder at cover

Behrendorff to Dhawan, out Lbw!! Dhawan walks back for a golden duck! Pitches this one around off and of full length, Dhawan looks to flick across the line and gets struck on the pads. This was dead plumb and up goes the umpire's finger as it didn't need much of an appealing by the Aussies. Dhawan lbw b Behrendorff 0(1)

Behrendorff to Rohit, leg byes, 1 run, appeal for an lbw, turned down! An inswinging length delivery around middle and leg, Rohit looks to tuck it to the leg side but gets beaten and struck on the pads. And it's a horrible review by Australia. The ball pitched outside leg and as it was swinging down, the impact was outside leg too. It was missing the leg stump too. Australia have lost their only review!
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, back of a length around middle and leg, Rohit nudges this in front of square leg
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, undeviated length delivery in the channel outside off, Rohit shoulders arms
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, skidding along the deck around middle and leg, Rohit looks to tuck in to the leg side, gets hit on the thigh pad instead
Behrendorff to Rohit, no run, short of a length around off and Rohit dabs it into the off side
